docs.snippet: Women played baseball before they could vote — and they still should....
docs.lead_paragraph: Women played baseball before they could vote — and they still should.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Sports Illustrated senior editor Emma Span challenges conventional wisdom that baseball is for boys and softball is for girls, suggesting that separation of genders into two different sports is sexist at heart; notes that history of women playing baseball dates to 1830s and that women were forced from sport when it went professional; holds that herding women into softball violates Title IX federal law.

docs.snippet: Jamil Boldian headed to college four years ago, arriving in small-town Ohio with a one-way Megabus ticket and $17.91 to his name....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jamil Boldian headed to college four years ago, arriving in small-town Ohio with a one-way Megabus ticket and $17.91 to his name.
